skittish.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an animal, especially a horse, that is skittish gets excited or frightened very easily
skittish.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a person who is skittish is not very serious, and their feelings, behaviour, and opinions keep changing
skittish.translation[0].definitions[2].d: if people who buy shares are skittish, they are nervous and worried about them dropping in value, and might sell the shares that they own because of this
skittish.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Some skittish Wall Street investors are staying away from the market.
